name: Arnulfo Briceño
description:
'''Arnulfo Briceño Contreras'''{{family name footnote|Briceño|Contreras|lang=Spanish}} (1938–1989) was a Colombian musician, songwriter, and lawyer.
Briceño is considered a master of the Colombian genre of [[música llanera]].
His composition "[[Ay Mi Llanura]]" was made the official anthem of [[Meta Department|Meta]] in 1979.
